general.gigTitle: develop, fix custom PHP website for you

sellerCard.oneLiner: Full Stack Web and Mobile Application Developer, Seasoned Laravel Dev
sellerCard.description: As a seasoned Full Stack web and mobile application developer with over four years of industry experience, I specialize in designing and developing high-end, complex, and scalable projects. My expertise spans a wide array of technologies, including PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, Flutter, Dart, MySQL, Vue JS, WordPress, HTML, CSS. With a proven track record of delivering exceptional solutions, I am committed to leveraging my skills and experience to meet your project's unique requirements and exceed expectations. Let's collaborate to bring your vision to life with precision and professionalism.

description.content:
Hi,


Do you want to fix issues on your PHP/Laravel/Codeigniter website?

Do you want to develop a custom website?


Then you have come to the right place.


I am a full-stack developer having 3 years of experience in designing and developing web applications using PHP, Laravel, Vue, HTML, CSS, JS, MySQL


I am providing the following services on this gig:


My Basic Package Services:

  • PHP, Laravel, MySQL related tasks
  • HTML, CSS, JS related tasks
  • Script Installation on the server
  • Bugs fixing
  • Consultation/help in your projects


My Standard Package Services:


  • Maximum 5 pages PHP/Laravel web application
  • Admin Panel to manage your web application
  • Ensure website security by ensuring security measures such as using Prepared Statements for SQL queries.
  • 6 months free post-management support.


My Premium Package Services:


  • More than 5 pages PHP/Laravel web application
  • Admin Panel to manage your web application
  • Ensure website security by ensuring security measures such as using Prepared Statements for SQL queries.
  • 6 months free post-management support.
  • Well-organized code & logic.


Note: Order me! I bet you won't regret it. Please message me before placing an order.


Kind Regards,

Hassan Javaid

questionsAndAnswers.question: Your sample work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can just message me to view my sample work, I would love to share my work with you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide the source code?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do provide the source code. The source is for the client.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are you experienced in the web development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I have two years of industry experience in developing and designing  web applications using HTML, CSS, Javascript, jquery, ajax, bootstrap, PHP, and MySQL..

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I provide help/consultation in projects?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I am very happy to assist you in your projects/task, just share with me your project/task, and I will be there to help you with the project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does my website will have a page speed of more than 90%?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, after the development of the website, I do provide website optimization free of cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Your technology stack?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Well, I build website with core PHP or with Laravel Framework. So it's up to you whether you want to build your website in core PHP or with Laravel Framework.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you built website with Laravel Framework?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do build websites with Laravel Framework.

reviews.comment: I would recommend Hassan to others, I would very much like to work with him.
The job to develop a website was carried out to perfection. we are happy customers!

top rate! highly recommended for any project. he kept me on track and went above and beyond in speed and communication. 

I was strapped for time and he worked with me to deliver a product that met our agreement and we have plans for more in the future. thank you!
